name: Ocean Current Shoulder Throw
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text:
Main You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards: Play up to 1 {Fish-Man} type Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your hand. Then, return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 6000 base power to the owner's hand. 
Counted Draw 1 card. Then, up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
